page.title: 14BURTON SALMON HOME LIFE 1
page.content: At home I get up at quarter to nine and put on the television. It takes me about fifteen minutes to get dressed. I never have breakfast. I sit down to watch the television for a while. If there is nothing good on the television then I put on the video-recorder and watch that. I enjoyed watching the recording of Live-aid. This was a live concert given by popstars to help raise money for the starving people in Africa. My friend Joseph has a pet rabbit. In the morning he has to go outside to uncover the rabbit hutch and give the rabbit some food. The rabbit is called Clover.
